channel.title: The Iphone 5?
channel.description: How does everyone feel about the iphone 5? I mean I heard at my highschool that the Iphone is going to improve the economy by .05% ... I honestly just think its 5 of the same thing.. I have the 4s and im happy with that. I wont be getting the 5. Although I do like how its a little bit taller and smaller. Feels like a better fit for your hand.

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I used to be an Apple hipster, but like I said saw the light. And unless they change their ways, I shall continue to be on #teamdroid

Also, why do you think Apple wanted to sue Samsung for the Samsung Galaxy s3? They saw it as a threat!

Read full topic

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

s3 > ichode5

It really just looks like they take stuff and rename it their own, and then release it, also the fact that its so behind hardware wise, “a6” chip, my ass, they don’t want any of their hipster mainstream fanboys to know how shitty it really is, but thats probably what pisses me off the most, the hipster fans of apple who think they created the world/steve jobs “invented technology” He himself is a dropout idea stealing hipster, so hes going to have tons of followers like himself

Yes, this is a rant, I hate apple, the way they do things, and their fans, with all my heart

YES THIS IS A RANT

Get the s3

Read full topic

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I have seen the light my friends. HTC One x is what I went with, and I don’t regret it a single bit. From what I’ve seen it does almost everything an iPhone does and then some. Apple fanboys will try and say it’s 10x better, but in reality it’s not. There is so much more you could do with the hardware that Apple puts into their phones, but you can’t do it because they limit it. Why do you think so many people jailbreak them? Also, I may be wrong about this but I haven’t seen it anywhere. The iphone is all the way up the the iPhone 5 and still does not have 4G Lte? lol wut. My HTC One x got up to 45Mb/s down and nearly 25Mb/s up with 4G Lte. That’s pretty fast for a phone. The great thing is, I’m still grandfathered in with my unlimited data plan from back when I got my iPhone 3G from at&t

Read full topic

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:5, topic:459854”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=562759.msg4102923#msg4102923 date=1347703944]
I haven’t really done my research on it, so don’t quote me on this, but I feel as if the only improvements they’ve made is to make it faster, make siri more useful and added length to it. I haven’t seen a full feature list though, so I could easily be wrong.
[/quote]
it’s also lighter, and has a new network called LTE, which is like mega speed… it’s actual pretty school. Other than that, that’s pretty much it.[/quote]
4G LTE isn’t that good
Its over priced
they only offer capped connection, so no unlimited data for newer phones.

Read full topic

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Si Force:

I haven’t really done my research on it, so don’t quote me on this, but I feel as if the only improvements they’ve made is to make it faster, make siri more useful and added length to it. I haven’t seen a full feature list though, so I could easily be wrong.

it’s also lighter, and has a new network called LTE, which is like mega speed… it’s actual pretty school. Other than that, that’s pretty much it.

item.title: The Iphone 5?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

omgilikepie:

They didn’t change much at all from what I’ve seen. Just the key things you’ve pointed out really. I think I’m gonna ditch my iPhone 4 (That already has a broke screen) and go android with either the Samsung Galaxy 3 or the HTC One X

Very smart choice, my friend.
